HotelElement.Name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Toronto Vaughan

Description.Text: Facilities The apartment hotel comprises a total of 140 rooms. Services and facilities at the hotel include a newspaper stand, a conference room, a business centre and a fireplace. Wireless internet access is available to travellers in the public areas. Guests can buy souvenirs at the gift shop. Those arriving in their own vehicles can leave them in the car park of the hotel. Rooms Each of the rooms is appointed with air conditioning, a living room and a kitchen. A sofabed ensures a good night's sleep. Separate bedrooms are also available. Amenities in all rooms include a safe. A fridge, a cooker and a tea/coffee station are provided as standard. Other features include internet access, a telephone, a TV and WiFi. The accommodation offers family rooms and non-smoking rooms. Sports/Entertainment At the apartment hotel, travellers can choose from a number of sports, leisure and relaxation activities available. The hotel features a pool and an indoor pool. The hot tub is the perfect place to relax. The accommodation offers a gym (for a fee) to guests. Meals Bed and breakfast is bookable. Options include breakfast.
